programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a barrister is killed in Midsomer, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. Grady has just returned to the village where he committed the murder years ago amid much anger from locals.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of a journalist has echoes of a 1960s horror film starring Midsomers own Stella Harris. When Stellas more famous sister returns after a 40-year family rift, the killings escalate.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, amateur astronomer Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harriet Farmer wakes up after being in a coma since the night she tried to elope. Soon afterwards, a killer strikes members of a chess club.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A woman is crushed to death with a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue. As other people linked to the dairy meet agonising deaths, long-held secrets start to emerge.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of a local beauty is discovered by the pool at her manor house, Barnaby and Troy uncover a seedy world of adultery and deceit within the affluent rural community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Someone is killing off parish church bell ringers in the week before a big bell-ringing competition takes place in the village of Midsomer Mallow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates the murder of a boy during a traditional annual race at an exclusive private school but meets with resentment.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An investigation of a car fire and a bludgeon murder lead Barnaby and Troy to investigate the members of a local reading club which has an agenda that goes beyond books.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in Setwale Wood, an apparent suicide, except that her suicide note is emailed after her body has already been sighted.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a local DJ is crushed to death at a traditional girls boarding school, new DCI John Barnaby soon discovers that murder and deception are never far away.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The reclusive life of elderly eccentrics William and Mary Bingham comes under police scrutiny when a social services investigator is killed. Barnaby and Jones must unearth generations of secrets

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young woman is dressed like a bride and drowned in a bath, it triggers a spate of ghoulish wedding-themed murders in Great Worthy. The case takes Barnaby and Jones to a donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Jones goes undercover at the Oblong Foundation after one of the cults young female members disappears suddenly. But he and Barnaby soon start digging into an old case.
